recipe.title: Goat Cheese, Salami, and Tomato on Mini-Bagels
ingredients: 10 mini-bagels, halved horizontally and toasted lightly
10 slices of hard salami, each quartered into triangles
instructions: Spread the bagel halves with the goat cheese, top each half with 2 salami triangles, 3 slices of tomato, and a basil sprig, and sprinkle the toppings lightly with pepper.
